title: Coring
description: The activity of acquiring a core from within a wellbore. The two predominant types are by drilling, or by sidewall. In drilling a cylindrical sample of rock is collected using a core bit in conjunction with a core barrel and core catcher. Sidewall cores are taken from the side of the borehole, usually by a wireline tool. Sidewall cores may be taken using percussion or mechanical drilling.

allOf.title: Coring
allOf.description: Common properties for all coring types.

CoreIdentifier.title: Core Identifier
CoreIdentifier.description: Native identifier from a Master Data Management System or other trusted source external to OSDU - stored here in order to allow for multi-system connection and synchronization. If used, the "Source" property should identify that source system. i.e. this item is optional.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: The name of the core. For example ACME 1 Core 1

VerticalMeasurement.title: Vertical Measurement
VerticalMeasurement.description: References an entry in the VerticalMeasurements array for the Wellbore identified by WellboreID, or a standalone vertical reference which defines the vertical reference datum for all measured depths of the Coring record.

example.VerticalMeasurementDescription: Same vertical reference as wellbore ZDP, Measured Depth, Drillers Depth.

ServiceCompanyID.title: Service Company ID
ServiceCompanyID.description: The coring company that extracted the well core. For Example: ACME Limited PLC

TopDepth.title: Top Depth
TopDepth.description: The depth of the top of the core. The reference and kind of depth (e.g. driller's depth versus logger's depth) is described in data.VerticalMeasurement. For SidewallCores this is the depth of the shallowest core.

BottomDepth.title: Bottom Depth
BottomDepth.description: The depth of the base of the core. The reference and kind of depth (e.g. driller's depth versus logger's depth) is described in data.VerticalMeasurement. For SidewallCores this is the depth of the deepest core.

IsOriented.title: Core Oriented Indicator
IsOriented.description: Indicates if the core was oriented.

CoreRemarks.title: Core Remarks
CoreRemarks.description: An array contains narrative remarks pertaining to a core.

items.title: CoreRemark
items.description: An array contains narrative remarks pertaining to a core.

RemarkID.title: Remark ID
RemarkID.description: A unique identifier for each remark record.

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: A descriptive comment for this remark.

RemarkSource.title: Remark Source
RemarkSource.description: The person, vendor, interpreter or other provider of information.

PreferredDepthShiftsID.title: Preferred Depth Shifts ID
PreferredDepthShiftsID.description: The WellLog representation carrying the preferred core-depth to logging-depth correction or mapping.

HasTrippingSchedule.description: Flag indicating whether a detailed tripping schedule is available. Available tripping schedules are usually a sign of controlled coring sample quality.

CoringOperationDate.title: Recovery Date
CoringOperationDate.description: The date of the coring operation.

CoreRecoveredDate.title: Core Recovered Date
CoreRecoveredDate.description: The date the core returned to surface.

PreservationTypeID.title: Preservation Type ID
PreservationTypeID.description: The kind of preservation applied to this conventional coring or sidewall core.

allOf.title: ConventionalOrSidewall
allOf.description: Switchboard for conventional or sidewall coring structures.

CoreTypeID.title: Core Type ID
CoreTypeID.description: The name identifying the type of coring procedure used to extract the core, e.g., Conventional Core,  Drop Cores.

CoreSectionID.title: Core Section ID
CoreSectionID.description: A unique core section identifier, typically for human consumption.

RecoveredLength.title: Recovered Length
RecoveredLength.description: The length of core section recovered.

TopDepth.title: Top Depth
TopDepth.description: The measured depth at the top of this section, typically in driller's depth.

BottomDepth.title: Bottom Depth
BottomDepth.description: The measured depth at the base of this section, typically driller's depth.

RecoveredLength.title: Recovered Length
RecoveredLength.description: The length of core recovered in this run.

CoreTypeID.title: Core Type ID
CoreTypeID.description: The name identifying the type of coring procedure used to extract the sidewall core, e.g., percussion or rotary (mechanical)  sidewall core.

SidewallCores.title: Sidewall Cores
SidewallCores.description: The array of sidewall core samples, their depth and description.

items.title: SidewallCoreSample
items.description: A core taken during sidewall coring.

SampleID.title: Sample ID
SampleID.description: Typically a sequential number identifying the sidewall core sample.

Depth.title: Depth
Depth.description: The measured depth at position the sidewall core was taken, typically in logger's depth.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: The sidewall core sample description, if available.
Description.example: SANDSTONE:  (100%)  light olive grey, minor light grey to medium light grey, very soft to friable, fine to medium grained, predominantly fine grained, sub-angular, rare sub-rounded, sub-spherical, well to very well sorted, trace weak siliceous cement, trace argillaceous matrix, trace pinkish grey quartz grains, trace micro micas, trace carbonaceous (?) specks, good intergranular visual porosity.

RecoveredLength.title: Recovered Length
RecoveredLength.description: The recovered length of the sidewall core.

PlannedVersusActual.title: Planned versus Actual
PlannedVersusActual.description: The ratio between planned sidewall cores versus the actually retrieved sidewall cores.
